INSERT INTO TB_Daily_Stat_Customer(
) SELECT tp.Customer_ID,DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d'), IFNULL(Order_Count,0) , IFNULL(Order_Amount,0),'admin' ,now() FROM tb_customer tp left join ( SELECT a.customer_Id, count(Work_Seq) Order_Count, SUM(Product_Price) Order_Amount FROM TB_Work_Bottle A WHERE Bottle_Work_Cd in ('0308','0309') AND DATE_FORMAT(A.Create_Dt,'%Y/%m/%d') = DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m/%d') GROUP BY A.customer_Id ) Tm on tm.customer_id = tp.customer_ID

INSERT INTO TB_Monthly_Stat_Customer(
) SELECT Customer_ID , LEFT(Stat_Dt,7) , SUM(Order_Count) , SUM(Order_Amount) , 'admin' , NOW() FROM TB_Daily_Stat_customer WHERE LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day),'%Y/%m') GROUP BY Customer_ID,LEFT(Stat_Dt,7)
